author: Blake Schuster
title: Simon Pagenaud Wins IndyCar's 1st Virtual Race on Oval at Michigan Speedway
description: IndyCar made its long-awaited return to Michigan International Speedway on Saturday in the most unusual of ways...
content:
Chris Graythen/Getty Images
IndyCar made its long-awaited return to Michigan International Speedway on Saturday in the most unusual of ways. The two-mile oval track served as the backdrop for the series' Chevrolet 275 iRacing competition as the sport continu… [+533 chars]
